text: .@EnvAgency Chief Exec @JamesBevanEA tells @CommonsEFRA that #StormChristoph brings 24 to 48 hours of heavy rain to ground that is already saturated. #TeamEA on the ground working with partners to prepare. Check your flood risk here: https://t.co/CnoJPZIDpY https://t.co/DD7vHRRfXh

@JamesBevanEA says that 'if we want to improve the environment, rather than just manage its decline', @EnvAgency will need more investment. He and @EmmaHowardBoyd outline where their budget goes, including restoring nature & building resilience in the face of the climate crisis.
